Class FiltrageEntetesGatewayFilterFactory

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.cloud.gateway.support.AbstractConfigurable<ConfigurationFiltrageEntete>
org.springframework.cloud.gateway.filter.factory.AbstractGatewayFilterFactory<ConfigurationFiltrageEntete>
com.github.talbotgui.psl.socle.servicegateway.application.filtrageentete.FiltrageEntetesGatewayFilterFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.cloud.gateway.filter.factory.GatewayFilterFactory<ConfigurationFiltrageEntete>, org.springframework.cloud.gateway.support.Configurable<ConfigurationFiltrageEntete>, org.springframework.cloud.gateway.support.ShortcutConfigurable, org.springframework.context.ApplicationEventPublisherAware
@Component public class FiltrageEntetesGatewayFilterFactory extends org.springframework.cloud.gateway.filter.factory.AbstractGatewayFilterFactory<ConfigurationFiltrageEntete>
Filtre de la gateway pour éliminer les entêtes non autorisés des requêtes entrantes.
